sentences.sContent: Before then many children were cared for in large impersonal orphanages.
sentences.sCn: 在那以前，许多孩子在无人情味的大孤儿院里被照料。

synos.tran: 客观的；非个人的；没有人情味的；非人称的

remMethod.val: im(不) + personal(个人的) → 不投入个人感情的 → 不受个人感情影响的

trans.tranOther: If you describe a place, organization, or activity as impersonal, you mean that it is not very friendly and makes you feel unimportant because it involves or is used by a large number of people
